urls.title: Go First Offices: Head Office & Airport Ticketing Offices
urls.description: Get in touch with us at the various Go First offices available across the globe. Head Office situated in Mumbai, India. Click to know more.

data.text:
@fbts02518814 Hi, we request you to refer to the below link for more details regarding your query-
https://t.co/f9B7VLNWas.

@Assertiv Hi Amarpreet, we hear you and apologize for the delay that you've experienced. We work hard to run an on-time airline; however, unforeseen events sometimes challenge us. Sorry, this happened with your flight. In the future, we'll try harder to meet your expectations.

@prithvirajbubka Hi Prithviraj, we are extremely sorry for the experience you had. It is never our intention to make our guests feel unhappy with our service. We have shared your feedback with the concerned team for review, and they'll surely look into this.

urls.title: Go First's Easy Web Check In for Domestic & International Flights
urls.description: Ensure social distancing with web check-in. Provide the relevant details and get your check-in process done within a few minutes. Learn more now.

data.text: @mufaddalvohre Hi, kindly refer to details of Web Check-In on our website https://t.co/EAOWlcrfkd.

@kashyapsiddhar3 Hi, we are extremely sorry for the experience you had. It is never our intention to make our guests feel unhappy with our service. We have shared your feedback with the concerned team for review, and they'll surely look into this.

urls.title: Book Domestic & International tickets online at lowest airfares- Go First
urls.description: Check flight offers and book tickets to your favourite destinations, avail ancillary benefits on your flight, and get the best hotel deals - all with Go First.
